Abstract: We introduce and develop the concept of dispersion formation control,
bridging a gap between shape-assembly studies in physics and biology and
formation control theory. In current formation control studies, the control
objectives typically focus on achieving desired local geometric properties,
such as inter-agent distances, bearings, or relative positions. In contrast,
our dispersion formation control approach enables agents to directly regulate
the dispersion of their spatial distribution, a global variable associated with
a covariance matrix. Specifically, we introduce the notion of covariance
similarity to define the target spatial dispersion of agents. Building on this
framework, we propose two control strategies: a centralized approach to
illustrate the key ideas, and a distributed approach that enables agents to
control the global dispersion but using only local information. Our stability
analysis demonstrates that both strategies ensure exponential convergence of
the agents' distribution to the desired dispersion. Notably, controlling a
global variable rather than multiple local ones enhances the resiliency of the
system, particularly against malfunctioning agents. Simulations validate the
effectiveness of the proposed dispersion formation control.

</details>


### [469] [Zonotope-Based Elastic Tube Model Predictive Control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19824)
*Sabin Diaconescu,Florin Stoican,Bogdan D. Ciubotaru,Sorin Olaru*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种新的缩放区域包含条件，以降低管模型预测控制(MPC)的数值复杂性，并验证了其有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 减少管参数化（表示为一系列弹性缩放的区域集）的数值复杂性。

Method: 提出了一种新的缩放区域包含条件，并对多面体和区域设置进行了全面的复杂性分析。

Result: 实现了计算复杂性的显著降低，并进行了广泛的数值实验验证。

Conclusion: 所提出的方法通过允许在吸引域和计算工作量之间进行权衡，有效降低了管MPC的数值复杂性。

Abstract: Tube-based Model Predictive Control (MPC) is a widely adopted robust control
framework for constrained linear systems under additive disturbance. The paper
is focused on reducing the numerical complexity associated with the tube
parameterization, described as a sequence of elastically-scaled zonotopic sets.
A new class of scaled-zonotope inclusion conditions is proposed, alleviating
the need for a priori specification of certain set-containment constraints and
achieving significant reductions in complexity. A comprehensive complexity
analysis is provided for both the polyhedral and the zonotopic setting,
illustrating the trade-off between an enlarged domain of attraction and the
required computational effort. The proposed approach is validated through
extensive numerical experiments.

</details>


### [470] [An early termination strategy for the distributed biased min-consensus protocol under disturbances](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19832)
*Zicheng Huang,Wangzhi Zhou,Yuanqiu Mo*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本研究在有干扰的情况下研究了DBMC协议，提出了一个避免奇点并保证最短路径正确性的早期终止策略。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 先前的DBMC协议虽然能解决最短路径问题，但在存在干扰时存在奇点（增益无限大）的风险。本研究旨在解决该问题。

Method: 通过严格的误差边界分析，提出了一种实用的早期终止策略，以避免潜在的奇点。

Result: 建立了状态估计的严格误差边界，并提出了一种能在干扰下正确识别最短路径的早期终止策略。

Conclusion: 提出的早期终止策略能够有效避免DBMC协议在有干扰时出现的奇点问题，并保证最短路径的正确性。

Abstract: The distributed biased min-consensus (DBMC) protocol is an iterative scheme
that solves the shortest path problem asymptotically, requiring only local
information exchange between neighboring nodes. By appropriately designing the
gain function, prior work [1] proposed a DBMC-based system that ensures
convergence within a pre-specified time interval. However, this guarantee
assumes the absence of disturbances. In this paper, we study the DBMC-based
system under disturbances affecting the edge weights. We first establish
rigorous error bounds on the resulting state estimates. Building on this
analysis, we then propose a practical early termination strategy to prevent
potential singularities, specifically, unbounded gain, that may arise in the
presence of disturbances, while still ensuring that the shortest paths are
correctly identified.Simulations are performed to validate and illustrate the
theoretical results.

</details>


### [471] [CollaPipe: Adaptive Segment-Optimized Pipeline Parallelism for Collaborative LLM Training in Heterogeneous Edge Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19855)
*Jiewei Chen,Xiumei Deng,Zehui Xiong,Shaoyong Guo,Xuesong Qiu,Ping Wang,Dusit Niyato*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: CollaPipe是一个混合分布式学习框架，通过结合协同流水线并行和联邦聚合来支持自适应智能网络，解决了在移动边缘计算（MEC）网络中训练Transformer大型语言模型（LLMs）的挑战。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了满足智能移动应用日益增长的需求，在移动边缘计算（MEC）网络中实现多智能体协作和基于Transformer的大型语言模型（LLMs）训练至关重要，但现有的训练方法面临计算量大、端到端延迟高和模型泛化能力有限等挑战。

Method: CollaPipe框架将Transformer模型的编码器部分自适应地划分为可变大小的段并部署在移动设备上进行流水线并行训练，而解码器部分则部署在边缘服务器上执行生成任务。随后，通过联邦聚合进行全局模型更新。为了提高训练效率，我们提出了一种联合优化问题，以自适应地分配模型段、微批次、带宽和传输功率。我们推导并使用了一个闭合形式的收敛界限，设计了一个基于Lyapunov优化的动态分段调度和资源分配（DSSDA）算法，以确保在长期约束下的系统稳定性。

Result: CollaPipe在下游任务和Transformer、BERT模型上的广泛实验表明，该框架可将计算效率提高高达15.09%，端到端延迟降低至少48.98%，单设备内存使用量减半以上，从而在异构和动态通信环境中实现在线学习。

Conclusion: CollaPipe通过创新的混合分布式学习方法，有效解决了在移动边缘计算环境中训练大型语言模型的挑战，显著提高了训练效率、降低了延迟并减少了内存消耗，为实现自适应智能网络提供了可行方案。

Abstract: The increasing demand for intelligent mobile applications has made
multi-agent collaboration with Transformer-based large language models (LLMs)
essential in mobile edge computing (MEC) networks. However, training LLMs in
such environments remains challenging due to heavy computation, high end-to-end
latency, and limited model generalization. We introduce CollaPipe, a hybrid
distributed learning framework that integrates collaborative pipeline
parallelism with federated aggregation to support self-evolving intelligent
networks. In CollaPipe, the encoder part is adaptively partitioned into
variable-sized segments and deployed across mobile devices for
pipeline-parallel training, while the decoder is deployed on edge servers to
handle generative tasks. Then we perform global model update via federated
aggregation. To enhance training efficiency, we formulate a joint optimization
problem that adaptively allocates model segments, micro-batches, bandwidth, and
transmission power. We derive and use a closed-form convergence bound to design
an Dynamic Segment Scheduling and Resource Allocation (DSSDA) algorithm based
on Lyapunov optimization, ensuring system stability under long-term
constraints. Extensive experiments on downstream tasks with Transformer and
BERT models show that CollaPipe improves computation efficiency by up to
15.09%, reduces end-to-end latency by at least 48.98%, and cuts single device
memory usage by more than half, enabling online learning in heterogeneous and
dynamic communication environments.

</details>


### [472] [Scalable and Approximation-free Symbolic Control for Unknown Euler-Lagrange Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19859)
*Ratnangshu Das,Shubham Sawarkar,Pushpak Jagtap*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出了一种新的符号控制框架，用于在欧拉-拉格朗日系统中强制执行时序逻辑规约，解决了传统基于抽象方法的关键局限性。该方法仅依赖于系统参数的界限和输入约束，并确保了整个连续时间轨迹的正确性。该框架结合了对简化虚拟系统的可扩展抽象和一种闭式、无模型的控制器，该控制器保证轨迹满足原始规约，同时尊重输入界限并对未知但有界扰动保持鲁棒性。文章给出了约束区域构造的可行性条件，并分析了效率与保守性之间的权衡。对摆锤动力学、双连杆机械臂和多主体系统的案例研究（包括硬件实验）表明，该方法在确保正确性和安全性的同时，显著降低了计算时间和内存需求。这些结果突显了该方法在精确模型不可用且连续时间保证至关重要的现实机器人系统中的可扩展性和实用性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统基于抽象的方法需要精确的模型，并且只能在离散的采样瞬间提供保证。而本文提出的方法仅依赖于参数界限和输入约束，并为整个连续时间轨迹提供保证，解决了这些关键局限性。

Method: 提出了一种新的符号控制框架，该框架结合了对简化虚拟系统的可扩展抽象和一种闭式、无模型的控制器。此控制器保证轨迹满足原始时序逻辑规约，同时尊重输入界限，并对未知但有界扰动保持鲁棒性。文章还给出了约束区域构造的可行性条件，并分析了效率与保守性之间的权衡。

Result: 所提出的方法在摆锤动力学、双连杆机械臂和多主体系统的案例研究（包括硬件实验）中得到了验证。结果表明，该方法在确保正确性和安全性的同时，显著降低了计算时间和内存需求。

Conclusion: 该框架在精确模型不可用且连续时间保证至关重要的现实机器人系统中具有良好的可扩展性和实用性。

Abstract: We propose a novel symbolic control framework for enforcing temporal logic
specifications in Euler-Lagrange systems that addresses the key limitations of
traditional abstraction-based approaches. Unlike existing methods that require
exact system models and provide guarantees only at discrete sampling instants,
our approach relies only on bounds on system parameters and input constraints,
and ensures correctness for the full continuous-time trajectory. The framework
combines scalable abstraction of a simplified virtual system with a
closed-form, model-free controller that guarantees trajectories satisfy the
original specification while respecting input bounds and remaining robust to
unknown but bounded disturbances. We provide feasibility conditions for the
construction of confinement regions and analyze the trade-off between
efficiency and conservatism. Case studies on pendulum dynamics, a two-link
manipulator, and multi-agent systems, including hardware experiments,
demonstrate that the proposed approach ensures both correctness and safety
while significantly reducing computational time and memory requirements. These
results highlight its scalability and practicality for real-world robotic
systems where precise models are unavailable and continuous-time guarantees are
essential.

</details>


### [473] [Modeling and Control of Deep Sign-Definite Dynamics with Application to Hybrid Powertrain Control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19869)
*Teruki Kato,Ryotaro Shima,Kenji Kashima*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 深度学习模型通过引入符号约束来增强物理一致性和控制稳定性，解决了传统深度学习在复杂系统建模中预测不准确和控制不连续的问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 标准深度学习模型在处理复杂系统时，往往无法保证物理结构的一致性以及下游控制的凸性，导致预测结果不符合物理规律，并且由于非凸性引起控制输入的不连续。这在需要物理约束的场景下是一个关键问题。

Method: 提出了一种名为“符号约束”（sign constraints）的方法，即对雅可比矩阵的项施加符号限制，以此统一保证单调性、正值性和符号定值性。同时，开发了相应的模型构建方法来强制执行这些约束，并设计了一个控制合成程序。具体来说，设计了精确可线性化的深度模型来满足这些约束，并将模型预测控制（MPC）表述为一个凸二次规划问题，从而得到唯一的优化解和 Lipschitz 连续的控制律。

Result: 在双罐系统和混合动力总成的测试中，该方法相较于现有技术，提高了预测的准确性，并生成了更平滑的控制输入。

Conclusion: 通过引入符号约束和相应的模型构建方法，可以开发出在物理上一致且控制性能优越的深度学习模型，特别是在需要精确控制和稳定性的复杂系统中，该方法能够有效解决传统深度学习方法的局限性。

Abstract: Deep learning is increasingly used for complex, large-scale systems where
first-principles modeling is difficult. However, standard deep learning models
often fail to enforce physical structure or preserve convexity in downstream
control, leading to physically inconsistent predictions and discontinuous
inputs owing to nonconvexity. We introduce sign constraints--sign restrictions
on Jacobian entries--that unify monotonicity, positivity, and
sign-definiteness; additionally, we develop model-construction methods that
enforce them, together with a control-synthesis procedure. In particular, we
design exactly linearizable deep models satisfying these constraints and
formulate model predictive control as a convex quadratic program, which yields
a unique optimizer and a Lipschitz continuous control law. On a two-tank system
and a hybrid powertrain, the proposed approach improves prediction accuracy and
produces smoother control inputs than existing methods.

</details>


### [474] [Control and Navigation of a 2-D Electric Rocket](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19970)
*André Fonte,Pedro Santos,Paulo Oliveira*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种用于模拟二维电力火箭的控制和导航方法，该方法使用LQR和卡尔曼滤波技术，并在MATLAB/Simulink中进行了评估，但存在横向轴的局限性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了解决模拟二维电力火箭的控制和导航问题，该模型简化了执行器动力学和空气动力学效应，同时考虑了欠驱动和状态耦合的复杂性。

Method: 采用模块化和分层控制架构，结合线性二次调节器（LQR）和李雅普诺夫理论来实现轨迹跟踪。通过卡尔曼滤波技术实现全状态估计，并将其整合到导航模块中。

Result: 在自定义的MATLAB/Simulink测试环境中对所提出的解决方案进行了全面评估，模拟了真实世界的条件，但结果显示在横向轴上存在局限性。

Conclusion: 该研究为模拟二维电力火箭的控制和导航提供了一种可行的方法，但横向轴的局限性有待在未来工作中解决。

Abstract: This work addresses the control and navigation of a simulated two-dimensional
electric rocket. The model provides a simplified framework that neglects
actuator dynamics and aerodynamic effects while capturing the complexities of
underactuation and state coupling. Trajectory tracking is achieved through a
modularized and layered control architecture, with employement of a Linear
Quadratic Regulator (LQR) and Lyapunov theory. Full-state estimation is
achieved through Kalman filtering techniques, part of the navigation module.
The solutions are thoroughly evaluated in a custom-built MATLAB/Simulink
testbed, simulating real-world conditions while maintaining a simplified setup.
The results reveal limitations along the lateral axis, whose resolution is
suggested for future work.

</details>


### [475] [Distributed Koopman Operator Learning from Sequential Observations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20071)
*Ali Azarbahram,Shenyu Liu,Gian Paolo Incremona*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种分布式koopman算子学习框架，用于通过多智能体顺序观测来模拟未知的非线性动力学。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 使用顺序观测从多个智能体中学习未知的非线性动力学。

Method: 每个智能体基于提升数据估计局部koopman近似，并通过通信图协作，以实现一致的分布式近似的指数共识。该方法支持在异步和资源受限的传感下进行分布式计算。

Result: 通过仿真结果证明了该方法的性能，在传感受限和通信有限的情况下验证了其收敛性和预测精度。

Conclusion: 该框架能够有效处理异步和资源受限的传感，并在多智能体系统中实现一致的分布式koopman近似。

Abstract: This paper presents a distributed Koopman operator learning framework for
modeling unknown nonlinear dynamics using sequential observations from multiple
agents. Each agent estimates a local Koopman approximation based on lifted data
and collaborates over a communication graph to reach exponential consensus on a
consistent distributed approximation. The approach supports distributed
computation under asynchronous and resource-constrained sensing. Its
performance is demonstrated through simulation results, validating convergence
and predictive accuracy under sensing-constrained scenarios and limited
communication.

</details>


### [476] [Koopman-Operator-Based Model Predictive Control for Drag-free Satellite](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20100)
*Yankai Wang,Ti Chen*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本篇论文提出了一种基于Koopman算子理论的无拖曳卫星非线性动力学数据驱动建模方法，并设计了基于辨识模型的模型预测控制器。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提出一种用于无拖曳卫星非线性动力学的数据驱动建模方法，并设计相应的模型预测控制器。

Method: 利用SINDy（Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics）算法，以手动构建的非线性函数作为可观测量，对无拖曳卫星的非线性动力学进行辨识，得到系统近似模型，并基于此SINDy模型设计了用于测试质量捕获的线性模型预测控制器。

Result: 通过数值算例验证了模型预测控制器的有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于Koopman算子理论和SINDy算法的数据驱动建模方法能够有效地辨识无拖曳卫星的非线性动力学，并成功设计了用于测试质量捕获的模型预测控制器，其有效性已通过数值算例得到验证。

Abstract: This paper presents a data-driven modelling method for nonlinear dynamics of
drag-free satellite based on Koopman operator theory, and a model predictive
controller is designed based on the identified model. The nonlinear dynamics of
drag-free satellite are identified and controlled based on Sparse
Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics (SINDy). Using the manually constructed
nonlinear function dictionary as observables, the system approximation is
obtained by SINDy algorithm, and a linear Model Predictive Control (MPC)
controller is designed for test mass capture based on the SINDy model. Finally,
the effectiveness of MPC control is verified by numerical examples.

</details>


### [477] [Certified Learning-Enabled Noise-Aware Motion Planning for Urban Air Mobility](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20306)
*Jaejeong Park,Mahmoud Elfar,Cody Fleming,Yasser Shoukry*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种新颖的城市空中交通（UAM）噪音感知运动规划框架，以解决城市空中交通中的噪音问题，确保其能够符合社区噪音法规并保持运行效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 城市空中交通（UAM）虽然能缓解城市拥堵，但其产生的噪音是公众接受和监管批准的主要障碍，可能限制UAM系统的运营范围和可扩展性。因此，UAM系统的成功推广依赖于准确预测噪音水平并制定符合社区噪音法规的运动规划策略。

Method: 首先，开发了一个可验证的神经网络模型来准确预测城市环境中电动垂直起降（eVTOL）飞机的噪音传播模式，并提供其正确性的可证明界限。然后，提出了一种主动采样策略来高效地构建用于训练和测试噪音模型的训练集。其次，开发了一种噪音感知的运动规划算法，该算法利用噪音模型生成符合社区噪音法规的eVTOL轨迹，并通过利用噪音模型的单调结构来高效地采样配置空间。

Result: 提出的框架能够为Vahana eVTOL飞机生成符合社区噪音法规的飞行计划，同时优化运行效率。

Conclusion: 所提出的噪音感知运动规划框架能够有效地解决UAM系统的噪音问题，生成既符合噪音法规又兼顾运行效率的eVTOL飞行轨迹，为UAM系统的广泛应用铺平了道路。

Abstract: Urban Air Mobility (UAM) has emerged as a promising solution to alleviate
urban congestion and transportation challenges. Nevertheless, the noise
generated by eVTOL aircrafts poses a significant barrier to public acceptance
and regulatory approval, potentially limiting the operational scope and
scalability of UAM systems. Hence, the successful adoption of UAM systems
hinges on the ability to predict generated noise levels, and further develop
motion planning strategies that comply with community-level noise regulations
while maintaining operational efficiency. To this end, this paper proposes a
novel noise-aware motion planning framework for UAM systems that ensures
compliance with noise regulations. We first develop a certifiable neural
network model to accurately predict eVTOL noise propagation patterns in urban
environments, providing provable bounds on its correctness. To achieve a
desired level of accuracy, we propose an active sampling strategy to
efficiently build the dataset used to train and test the noise model. Next, we
develop a noise-aware motion planning algorithm that utilizes the noise model
to generate eVTOL trajectories that guarantee compliance with community noise
regulations. The algorithm exploits the monotonic structure of the noise model
to efficiently sample the configuration space, ensuring that the generated
trajectories are both noise-compliant and operationally efficient. We
demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed framework through a number of
experiments for Vahana eVTOLs. The results show that the framework can generate
noise-compliant flight plans for a fleet of eVTOLs that adhere to community
noise regulations while optimizing operational efficiency.

</details>


### [478] [Adversarial Pursuits in Cislunar Space](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20330)
*Filippos Fotiadis,Quentin Rommel,Gregory Falco,Ufuk Topcu*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 为应对日益增长的在轨网络威胁，本研究提出了一种在三体问题背景下，考虑轨道动力学和流形约束的追踪-规避博弈模型，并通过微分动态规划方法求解，以保障未来的月球及行星际任务通信安全。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 月球及行星际任务日益依赖地月空间，但该区域的远程、稀疏基础设施和不稳定的动力学特性使其易受攻击，通信节点可能被切断。

Method: 将追踪-规避场景建模为一个零和对抗性微分博弈，并纳入了考虑了月球轨道动力学（包括参考轨道相位自主调整和轨道稳定/不稳定流形约束）的限制性三体问题。利用微分动态规划算法的连续时间变体，通过迭代线性二次近似来求解汉密尔顿-雅可比-艾萨克斯方程。

Result: 通过仿真验证了该模型在应对最坏情况追踪者和线性二次追踪者时的规避行为。

Conclusion: 所提出的方法为保障未来地月空间任务免受网络威胁提供了新的途径。

Abstract: Cislunar space is becoming a critical domain for future lunar and
interplanetary missions, yet its remoteness, sparse infrastructure, and
unstable dynamics create single points of failure. Adversaries in cislunar
orbits can exploit these vulnerabilities to pursue and jam co-located
communication relays, potentially severing communications between lunar
missions and the Earth. We study a pursuit-evasion scenario between two
spacecraft in a cislunar orbit, where the evader must avoid a pursuer-jammer
while remaining close to its nominal trajectory. We model the evader-pursuer
interaction as a zero-sum adversarial differential game cast in the circular
restricted three-body problem. This formulation incorporates critical aspects
of cislunar orbital dynamics, including autonomous adjustment of the reference
orbit phasing to enable aggressive evading maneuvers, and shaping of the
evader's cost with the orbit's stable and unstable manifolds. We solve the
resulting nonlinear game locally using a continuous-time differential dynamic
programming variant, which iteratively applies linear-quadratic approximations
to the Hamilton-Jacobi-Isaacs equation. We simulate the evader's behavior
against both a worst-case and a linear-quadratic pursuer. Our results pave the
way for securing future missions in cislunar space against emerging cyber
threats.

</details>


### [479] [Approximately Optimal Toll Design for Efficiency and Equity in Arc-Based Traffic Assignment Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20355)
*Chih-Yuan Chiu*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 拥堵收费政策通过向拥挤路段征收费用来减少交通拥堵，但现有的基于路段分配模型的收费方案往往忽视了对低收入人群的经济负担。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的基于路段分配模型的收费方案往往忽视了对低收入人群的经济负担，导致效率和公平性难以兼顾。

Method: 提出将拥堵收费的效率和公平性问题建模为双层优化问题，并构建了一个线性规划近似模型来解决该问题。

Result: 通过数值结果验证了理论结论的有效性。

Conclusion: 在设计拥堵收费政策时，需要在效率和公平性之间取得平衡，以实现更优的交通管理。

Abstract: Congestion pricing policies have emerged as promising traffic management
tools to alleviate traffic congestion caused by travelers' selfish routing
behaviors. The core principle behind deploying tolls is to impose monetary
costs on frequently overcrowded routes, to incentivize self-interested
travelers to select less easily congested routes. Recent literature has focused
on toll design based on arc-based traffic assignment models (TAMs), which
characterize commuters as traveling through a traffic network by successively
selecting an outgoing arc from every intermediate node along their journey.
However, existing tolling mechanisms predicated on arc-based TAMs often target
the design of a single congestion-minimizing toll, ignoring crucial fairness
considerations, such as the financial impact of high congestion fees on
low-income travelers. To address these shortcomings, in this paper, we pose the
dual considerations of efficiency and equity in traffic routing as bilevel
optimization problems. Since such problems are in general computationally
intractable to solve precisely, we construct a linear program approximation by
introducing a polytope approximation for the set of all tolls that induce
congestion-minimizing traffic flow patterns. Finally, we provide numerical
results that validate our theoretical conclusions.

</details>


<div id='cs.DS'></div>

# cs.DS [[Back]](#toc)

### [480] [A Note on Fine-Grained Quantum Reductions for Linear Algebraic Problems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19528)
*Kyle Doney,Cameron Musco*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 线性代数问题的算法复杂度与矩阵乘法复杂度等价，任何线性代数问题的算法改进都能加速矩阵乘法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 许多线性代数问题的已知最快算法需要$\
Theat a(n^\omega)$时间，其中\
omega\
\
approx 2.37。研究这些问题与矩阵乘法之间的关系，以寻求更快的算法。

Method: 利用Bernstein-Vazirani算法将矩阵乘法直接归约到计算$tr(ABC)$，然后将$tr(ABC)$归约到det(A), $tr(A^3), $tr(A^{-1})$等问题。

Result: 任何$T(n)$时间的线性代数算法（量子或经典）可以得到一个$O(T(n)) + \
~ O(n^2)$时间的量子算法，用于$n 	imes n$矩阵乘法。

Conclusion: 线性代数问题的复杂度与矩阵乘法问题本质上等价。任何超越$n^\omega$的算法改进将导致更快的量子矩阵乘法算法。

Abstract: We observe that any $T(n)$ time algorithm (quantum or classical) for several
central linear algebraic problems, such as computing $\det(A)$, $tr(A^3)$, or
$tr(A^{-1})$ for an $n \times n$ integer matrix $A$, yields a $O(T(n)) + \tilde
O(n^2)$ time \textit{quantum algorithm} for $n \times n$ matrix-matrix
multiplication. That is, on quantum computers, the complexity of these problems
is essentially equivalent to that of matrix multiplication. Our results follow
by first observing that the Bernstein-Vazirani algorithm gives a direct quantum
reduction from matrix multiplication to computing $tr(ABC)$ for $n \times n$
inputs $A,B,C$. We can then reduce $tr(ABC)$ to each of our problems of
interest.
  For the above problems, and many others in linear algebra, their fastest
known algorithms require $\Theta(n^\omega)$ time, where $\omega \approx 2.37$
is the current exponent of fast matrix multiplication. Our finding shows that
any improvements beyond this barrier would lead to faster quantum algorithms
for matrix multiplication. Our results complement existing reductions from
matrix multiplication in algebraic circuits [BCS13], and reductions that work
for standard classical algorithms, but are not tight -- i.e., which roughly
show that an $O(n^{3-\delta})$ time algorithm for the problem yields an
$O(n^{3-\delta/3})$ matrix multiplication algorithm [WW10].

</details>


### [481] [A Better-Than-$5/4$-Approximation for Two-Edge Connectivity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19655)
*Felix Hommelsheim,Alexander Lindermayr,Zhenwei Liu*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 我们提出了一个比现有最佳近似比（5/4）更好的（5/4 - η）近似算法来解决 2-边连通生成子图问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 2-边连通生成子图问题是可生存网络设计中的一个基本问题。给定一个 2-边连通图，目标是找到一个具有最少边数的 2-边连通生成子图。

Method: 我们的方法是对现有工作（采用三角形自由 2-边覆盖并添加少量边）的改进。我们设计了两个互补的算法来处理不同情况（4-环少或多），并采用了新的技术，如多彩桥覆盖、富顶点和分支粘合路径，以克服在打破 5/4 时的障碍。

Result: 我们设计了一个（5/4 - η）近似算法，其中 η ≥ 10^-6 是一个常数，比之前最好的近似比 5/4 有所改进。

Conclusion: 我们打破了 5/4 的近似比障碍，为 2-边连通生成子图问题提供了一个新的、改进的近似算法。

Abstract: The 2-Edge-Connected Spanning Subgraph Problem (2ECSS) is a fundamental
problem in survivable network design. Given an undirected $2$-edge-connected
graph, the goal is to find a $2$-edge-connected spanning subgraph with the
minimum number of edges; a graph is 2-edge-connected if it is connected after
the removal of any single edge. 2ECSS is APX-hard and has been extensively
studied in the context of approximation algorithms. Very recently, Bosch-Calvo,
Garg, Grandoni, Hommelsheim, Jabal Ameli, and Lindermayr showed the currently
best-known approximation ratio of $\frac{5}{4}$ [STOC 2025]. This factor is
tight for many of their techniques and arguments, and it was not clear whether
$\frac{5}{4}$ can be improved.
  We break this natural barrier and present a $(\frac{5}{4} -
\eta)$-approximation algorithm, for some constant $\eta \geq 10^{-6}$. On a
high level, we follow the approach of previous works: take a triangle-free
$2$-edge cover and transform it into a 2-edge-connected spanning subgraph by
adding only a few additional edges. For $\geq \frac{5}{4}$-approximations, one
can heavily exploit that a $4$-cycle in the 2-edge cover can ``buy'' one
additional edge. This enables simple and nice techniques, but immediately fails
for our improved approximation ratio. To overcome this, we design two
complementary algorithms that perform well for different scenarios: one for few
$4$-cycles and one for many $4$-cycles. Besides this, there appear more
obstructions when breaching $\frac54$, which we surpass via new techniques such
as colorful bridge covering, rich vertices, and branching gluing paths.

</details>


### [482] [Non-Clairvoyant Scheduling with Progress Bars](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19662)
*Ziyad Benomar,Romain Cosson,Alexander Lindermayr,Jens Schlöter*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 本篇论文提出了一种在非先知式调度场景下，利用进度条反馈来优化总作业完成时间的算法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在经典的非先知式调度问题中，我们无法预知单个作业的处理时间。近年来，随着学习增强算法的兴起，该问题受到了广泛关注。本研究旨在解决这个问题，并引入了进度条作为一种新的反馈机制。

Method: 作者提出了一种新的在线优化框架，该框架利用连续的进度条反馈（即作业完成进度的估计）来优化调度。他们设计了针对对抗性和随机性进度条的新算法，并证明了其具有很强的竞争力。此外，他们还提出了一种通用的调度算法组合方法，并引入了一个随机进度条模型作为传统最坏情况模型的替代方案。

Result: 在对抗性进度条的情况下，作者设计的算法不仅在进度条调度中表现出色，还在带作业大小预测的学习增强调度中提供了改进的保证。在随机进度条模型下，作者提出了一个渐近最优的调度算法。

Conclusion: 本研究成功地将进度条反馈引入非先知式调度问题，并在对抗性和随机性场景下都取得了显著的成果，尤其是在学习增强调度和带预测调度方面。作者提出的方法为解决在线优化问题提供了新的思路。

Abstract: In non-clairvoyant scheduling, the goal is to minimize the total job
completion time without prior knowledge of individual job processing times.
This classical online optimization problem has recently gained attention
through the framework of learning-augmented algorithms. We introduce a natural
setting in which the scheduler receives continuous feedback in the form of
progress bars: estimates of the fraction of each job completed over time. We
design new algorithms for both adversarial and stochastic progress bars and
prove strong competitive bounds. Our results in the adversarial case
surprisingly induce improved guarantees for learning-augmented scheduling with
job size predictions. We also introduce a general method for combining
scheduling algorithms, yielding further insights in scheduling with
predictions. Finally, we propose a stochastic model of progress bars as a more
optimistic alternative to conventional worst-case models, and present an
asymptotically optimal scheduling algorithm in this setting.

</details>


### [483] [SS-GUMAP, SL-GUMAP, SSSL-GUMAP: Fast UMAP Algorithms for Large Graph Drawing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19703)
*Amyra Meidiana,Seok-Hee Hong*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: UMAP是一种流行的降维算法，本文提出了三种加速其在图绘制中应用的算法（SS-GUMAP, SSL-GUMAP, SSSL-GUMAP），其中SSSL-GUMAP达到O(n)时间复杂度，并且实验证明了UMAP在图绘制上的有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: UMAP在图绘制中的应用尚未得到评估，且其朴素应用存在时间复杂度过高（O(nm)）的问题，难以处理大规模图。

Method: 本文提出了三种加速UMAP在图绘制中应用的算法：1. SS-GUMAP：利用谱稀疏化技术优化最短路径计算，将时间复杂度从O(nm)降至O(n^2 log n)。 2. SSL-GUMAP：通过部分BFS和边采样优化kNN图计算和成本优化，将时间复杂度分别降至线性时间和亚线性时间。 3. SSSL-GUMAP：结合前两种方法，实现整体O(n)时间复杂度。

Result: 实验结果显示，SS-GUMAP比朴素的UMAP图绘制方法快28%，质量相似。SSL-GUMAP和SSSL-GUMAP速度提升超过80%，质量损失小于15%。与tsNET相比，UMAP图绘制方法速度快90%，且在多项质量指标上表现更优。

Conclusion: UMAP是一种有效的图绘制算法，本文提出的加速算法（特别是SSSL-GUMAP）能够显著提高其效率，同时保持较高的绘图质量，解决了其在大规模图应用中的性能瓶颈。

Abstract: UMAP is a popular neighborhood-preserving dimension reduction (DR) algorithm.
However, its application for graph drawing has not been evaluated. Moreover, a
naive application of UMAP to graph drawing would include O(nm) time all-pair
shortest path computation, which is not scalable to visualizing large graphs.
  In this paper, we present fast UMAP-based for graph drawing. Specifically, we
present three fast UMAP-based algorithms for graph drawing: (1) The SS-GUMAP
algorithm utilizes spectral sparsification to compute a subgraph G' preserving
important properties of a graph G, reducing the O(nm) component of the runtime
to O(n^2 log n) runtime; (2) The SSL-GUMAP algorithm reduces the kNN (k-Nearest
Neighbors) graph computation from $O(n \log n)$ time to linear time using
partial BFS (Breadth First Search), and the cost optimization runtime from O(n)
time to sublinear time using edge sampling; (3) The SSSL-GUMAP algorithm
combines both approaches, for an overall O(n) runtime.
  Experiments demonstrate that SS-GUMAP runs 28% faster than GUMAP, a naive
application of UMAP to graph drawing, with similar quality metrics, while
SL-GUMAP and SSSL-GUMAP run over 80% faster than GUMAP with less than 15%
difference on average for all quality metrics.
  We also present an evaluation of GUMAP to tsNET, a graph layout based on the
popular DR algorithm t-SNE. GUMAP runs 90% faster than tsNET with similar
neighborhood preservation and, on average, 10% better on quality metrics such
as stress, edge crossing, and shape-based metrics, validating the effectiveness
of UMAP for graph drawing.

</details>


### [484] [Geometric Interpretation of 3-SAT and Phase Transition](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19740)
*Frederic Gillet*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 将3-SAT解释为体积填充问题，并利用该问题探索SAT/UNSAT相变。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文旨在将3-SAT（一个经典的NP完全问题）解释为体积填充问题，并利用这种新的视角来研究SAT/UNSAT相变。

Method: 提出了一种将3-SAT实例映射到几何空间的体积填充问题的方法。

Result: 通过体积填充的视角，研究了SAT/UNSAT相变的行为。

Conclusion: 将3-SAT解释为体积填充问题为理解SAT/UNSAT相变提供了一种新的方法。

Abstract: Interpretation of 3-SAT as a volume filling problem, and its use to explore
the SAT/UNSAT phase transition.

</details>


### [485] [BH-tsNET, FIt-tsNET, L-tsNET: Fast tsNET Algorithms for Large Graph Drawing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19785)
*Amyra Meidiana,Seok-Hee Hong,Kwan-Liu Ma*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: tsNET算法通过t-SNE实现高质量图绘制，并提出三种加速算法（BH-tsNET, FIt-tsNET, L-tsNET），将时间复杂度从O(nm)降低至O(n log n)和O(n)，实验证明新算法运行速度更快且图绘制质量相似。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: tsNET算法在图绘制方面表现出色，但其时间复杂度较高，限制了其应用，因此需要更快的算法来提高效率。

Method: 提出了三种加速tsNET算法的方法：BH-tsNET（O(n log n)），FIt-tsNET（O(n log n)），L-tsNET（O(n)）。这些方法通过优化高维概率计算（C0）、KL散度梯度计算（C1）和熵计算（C2）三个部分来实现。具体地，BH-tsNET结合了BFS和四叉树；FIt-tsNET结合了BFS和插值法；L-tsNET则使用了FFT加速的插值法。

Result: 与原始tsNET算法相比，BH-tsNET、FIt-tsNET和L-tsNET分别快了93.5%、96%和98.6%。在图绘制质量方面（邻域保持度、应力、边缘交叉和基于形状的度量），新算法与原始算法相当。此外，还与其他图绘制算法DRGraph进行了比较。

Conclusion: 新的加速算法（BH-tsNET, FIt-tsNET, L-tsNET）在保持高质量图绘制的同时，显著提高了tsNET算法的运行速度，使其在处理大规模数据集时更具优势。

Abstract: The tsNET algorithm utilizes t-SNE to compute high-quality graph drawings,
preserving the neighborhood and clustering structure. We present three fast
algorithms for reducing the time complexity of tsNET algorithm from O(nm) time
to O(n log n) time and O(n) time. To reduce the runtime of tsNET, there are
three components that need to be reduced: (C0) computation of high-dimensional
probabilities, (C1) computation of KL divergence gradient, and (C2) entropy
computation. Specifically, we reduce the overall runtime of tsNET, integrating
our new fast approaches for C0 and C2 with fast t-SNE algorithms for C1. We
first present O(n log n)-time BH-tsNET, based on (C0) new O(n)-time partial
BFS-based high-dimensional probability computation and (C2) new O(n log n)-time
quadtree-based entropy computation, integrated with (C1) O(n log n)-time
quadtree-based KL divergence computation of BH-SNE. We next present faster O(n
log n)-time FIt-tsNET, using (C0) O(n)-time partial BFS-based high-dimensional
probability computation and (C2) quadtree-based O(n log n)-time entropy
computation, integrated with (C1) O(n)-time interpolation-based KL divergence
computation of FIt-SNE. Finally, we present the O(n)-time L-tsNET, integrating
(C2) new O(n)-time FFT-accelerated interpolation-based entropy computation with
(C0) O(n)-time partial BFS-based high-dimensional probability computation, and
(C1) O(n)-time interpolation-based KL divergence computation of FIt-SNE.
Extensive experiments using benchmark data sets confirm that BH-tsNET,
FIt-tsNET, and L-tsNET outperform tsNET, running 93.5%, 96%, and 98.6% faster
while computing similar quality drawings in terms of quality metrics
(neighborhood preservation, stress, edge crossing, and shape-based metrics) and
visual comparison. We also present a comparison between our algorithms and
DRGraph, another dimension reduction-based graph drawing algorithm.

</details>


### [486] [Stealing From the Dragon's Hoard: Online Unbounded Knapsack With Removal](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19914)
*Matthias Gehnen,Moritz Stocker*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种新的在线背包问题变体——带移除的在线无界背包问题，并分析了其竞争算法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了研究在线背包问题的变体，特别是允许物品移除的情况，并寻找其竞争性算法。

Method: 提出了一种竞争性为1.6911的确定性算法，并给出了1.5877的下界。同时，分析了比例设置下的确定性算法（竞争性为3/2）和随机化算法（上下界分别为6/5和4/3）。

Result: 在一般设置下，我们提出了一个竞争性为1.6911的确定性算法，并给出了1.5877的下界。在比例设置下，我们证明了确定性算法的竞争性确界为3/2，并给出了随机化算法的竞争性上下界为6/5和4/3。

Conclusion: 带移除的在线无界背包问题存在具有竞争力的确定性算法，比例设置下的随机化算法也有一定的竞争性。

Abstract: We introduce the Online Unbounded Knapsack Problem with Removal, a variation
of the well-known Online Knapsack Problem. Items, each with a weight and value,
arrive online and an algorithm must decide on whether or not to pack them into
a knapsack with a fixed weight limit. An item may be packed an arbitrary number
of times and items may be removed from the knapsack at any time without cost.
The goal is to maximize the total value of items packed, while respecting a
weight limit. We show that this is one of the very few natural online knapsack
variants that allow for competitive deterministic algorithms in the general
setting, by providing an algorithm with competitivity 1.6911. We complement
this with a lower bound of 1.5877.
  We also analyze the proportional setting, where the weight and value of any
single item agree, and show that deterministic algorithms can be exactly
3/2-competitive. Lastly, we give lower and upper bounds of 6/5 and 4/3 on the
competitivity of randomized algorithms in this setting.

</details>


### [487] [Ads that Stick: Near-Optimal Ad Optimization through Psychological Behavior Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20304)
*Kailash Gopal Darmasubramanian,Akash Pareek,Arindam Khan,Arpit Agarwal*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 通过结合心理学原理（如单纯接触效应、享乐适应和操作性条件反射）来优化数字广告的投放时间和频率，提出了一种新的广告调度模型。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的广告调度策略依赖于简单的启发式方法，忽略了用户的长期兴趣，而用户的长期兴趣和参与度是多种心理效应相互作用的结果。

Method: 模型考虑了用户在看到广告后的兴趣变化，其中单纯接触效应和享乐适应效应通过用户兴趣随重复曝光的凹函数进行建模，而操作性条件反射效应则通过描述用户因过度曝光而导致兴趣下降的时间衰减函数进行建模。

Result: 研究表明，当广告展示次数固定时，最优广告调度仅取决于操作性条件反射函数。提出了一种接近最优的准线性时间算法，该算法在广告放置方面提供了重要见解，并表明在许多自然情况下，诸如均匀间隔之类的简单启发式方法并非最优。

Conclusion: 通过一种准线性时间算法，能够生成接近最优的广告调度，并且可以找到最优广告展示数量。实验结果支持了该策略优于各种基线的发现。

Abstract: Optimizing the timing and frequency of ads is a central problem in digital
advertising, with significant economic consequences. Existing scheduling
policies rely on simple heuristics, such as uniform spacing and frequency caps,
that overlook long-term user interest. However, it is well-known that users'
long-term interest and engagement result from the interplay of several
psychological effects (Curmei, Haupt, Recht, Hadfield-Menell, ACM CRS, 2022).
  In this work, we model change in user interest upon showing ads based on
three key psychological principles: mere exposure, hedonic adaptation, and
operant conditioning. The first two effects are modeled using a concave
function of user interest with repeated exposure, while the third effect is
modeled using a temporal decay function, which explains the decline in user
interest due to overexposure. Under our psychological behavior model, we ask
the following question: Given a continuous time interval $T$, how many ads
should be shown, and at what times, to maximize the user interest towards the
ads?
  Towards answering this question, we first show that, if the number of
displayed ads is fixed, then the optimal ad-schedule only depends on the
operant conditioning function. Our main result is a quasi-linear time algorithm
that outputs a near-optimal ad-schedule, i.e., the difference in the
performance of our schedule and the optimal schedule is exponentially small.
Our algorithm leads to significant insights about optimal ad placement and
shows that simple heuristics such as uniform spacing are sub-optimal under many
natural settings. The optimal number of ads to display, which also depends on
the mere exposure and hedonistic adaptation functions, can be found through a
simple linear search given the above algorithm. We further support our findings
with experimental results, demonstrating that our strategy outperforms various
baselines.

</details>


### [488] [Testable algorithms for approximately counting edges and triangles in sublinear time and space](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20351)
*Talya Eden,Ronitt Rubinfeld,Arsen Vasilyan*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一个无需图的稀疏性先验知识即可在亚线性时间（sublinear time）内计算图中边和三角形数量的近似算法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 先前算法在图的稀疏度（arboricity）受限时效率很高，但在该限制被打破时估计不准确。本研究旨在解决这一问题，提出一种不受稀疏度限制的算法。

Method: 算法尝试一系列可能的稀疏度值 $\tilde{\alpha}$，并结合测试性算法（testable algorithms）框架。当测试的稀疏度值不正确时，算法会检测到并更换候选值，直到找到正确的稀疏度值，从而保证估计的准确性。

Result: 对于三角形计数问题，提出了一种无需稀疏度限制的算法，其运行时间为 $O^*\left( \frac{m\cdot \alpha(G)}{t} + \frac{m}{t^{2/3}} \right)$，其中 $t$ 是图中三角形的数量，$\alpha(G)$ 是图的稀疏度。该算法能够动态适应图的特性。研究还表明，虽然该方法在保证正确性的同时保持了高效率，但如果先验知识（稀疏度）可能出错，则会产生不可避免的额外开销。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的算法在处理图中边和三角形计数问题时，无需对图的稀疏度进行预先假设，能够在亚线性时间内提供准确的近似估计。该算法通过动态调整和验证稀疏度估计值来保证鲁棒性，并在理论上证明了其效率和必要的开销。此外，该研究还探讨了该算法在流式计算模型中的应用。

Abstract: We consider the fundamental problems of approximately counting the numbers of
edges and triangles in a graph in sublinear time. Previous algorithms for these
tasks are significantly more efficient under a promise that the arboricity of
the graph is bounded by some parameter $\overline{\alpha}$. However, when this
promise is violated, the estimates given by these algorithms are no longer
guaranteed to be correct.
  For the triangle counting task, we give an algorithm that requires no promise
on the input graph $G$, and computes a $(1\pm \epsilon)$-approximation for the
number of triangles $t$ in $G$ in time $O^*\left( \frac{m\cdot \alpha(G)}{t} +
\frac{m}{t^{2/3}}
  \right)$, where $\alpha(G)$ is the arboricity of the graph. The algorithm can
be used on any graph $G$ (no prior knowledge the arboricity $\alpha(G)$ is
required), and the algorithm adapts its run-time on the fly based on the graph
$G$.
  We accomplish this by trying a sequence of candidate values $\tilde{\alpha}$
for $\alpha(G)$ and using a novel algorithm in the framework of testable
algorithms. This ensures that wrong candidates $\tilde{\alpha}$ cannot lead to
incorrect estimates: as long as the advice is incorrect, the algorithm detects
it and continues with a new candidate. Once the algorithm accepts the
candidate, its output is guaranteed to be correct with high probability.
  We prove that this approach preserves - up to an additive overhead - the
dramatic efficiency gains obtainable when good arboricity bounds are known in
advance, while ensuring robustness against misleading advice. We further
complement this result with a lower bound, showing that such an overhead is
unavoidable whenever the advice may be faulty.
  We further demonstrate implications of our results for triangle counting in
the streaming model.

</details>


<div id='cs.GR'></div>

# cs.GR [[Back]](#toc)

### [489] [EngravingGNN: A Hybrid Graph Neural Network for End-to-End Piano Score Engraving](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19412)
*Emmanouil Karystinaios,Francesco Foscarin,Gerhard Widmer*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: Error


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Error

Method: Error

Result: Error

Conclusion: Error

Abstract: This paper focuses on automatic music engraving, i.e., the creation of a
humanly-readable musical score from musical content. This step is fundamental
for all applications that include a human player, but it remains a mostly
unexplored topic in symbolic music processing. In this work, we formalize the
problem as a collection of interdependent subtasks, and propose a unified graph
neural network (GNN) framework that targets the case of piano music and
quantized symbolic input. Our method employs a multi-task GNN to jointly
predict voice connections, staff assignments, pitch spelling, key signature,
stem direction, octave shifts, and clef signs. A dedicated postprocessing
pipeline generates print-ready MusicXML/MEI outputs. Comprehensive evaluation
on two diverse piano corpora (J-Pop and DCML Romantic) demonstrates that our
unified model achieves good accuracy across all subtasks, compared to existing
systems that only specialize in specific subtasks. These results indicate that
a shared GNN encoder with lightweight task-specific decoders in a multi-task
setting offers a scalable and effective solution for automatic music engraving.

</details>


### [490] [AJAHR: Amputated Joint Aware 3D Human Mesh Recovery](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19939)
*Hyunjin Cho,Giyun Choi,Jongwon Choi*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 该研究提出了AJAHR框架，用于解决现有方法在处理残疾人三维人体网格恢复时的不足，并引入了A3D合成数据集。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的人体网格恢复方法忽略了肢体缺失等多样化的解剖结构，在应用于截肢个体时存在偏差，且缺乏合适的训练数据集。

Method: 提出AJAHR框架，集成了一个与网格恢复网络联合训练的身体部位截肢分类器来检测截肢，并创建了A3D合成数据集来用于训练。

Result: 在非截肢者上保持了有竞争力的性能，并在截肢者上取得了最先进的结果。

Conclusion: AJAHR框架和A3D数据集能够有效提高截肢者的三维人体网格恢复的准确性。

Abstract: Existing human mesh recovery methods assume a standard human body structure,
overlooking diverse anatomical conditions such as limb loss. This assumption
introduces bias when applied to individuals with amputations - a limitation
further exacerbated by the scarcity of suitable datasets. To address this gap,
we propose Amputated Joint Aware 3D Human Mesh Recovery (AJAHR), which is an
adaptive pose estimation framework that improves mesh reconstruction for
individuals with limb loss. Our model integrates a body-part amputation
classifier, jointly trained with the mesh recovery network, to detect potential
amputations. We also introduce Amputee 3D (A3D), which is a synthetic dataset
offering a wide range of amputee poses for robust training. While maintaining
competitive performance on non-amputees, our approach achieves state-of-the-art
results for amputated individuals. Additional materials can be found at the
project webpage.

</details>


### [491] [MeshMosaic: Scaling Artist Mesh Generation via Local-to-Global Assembly](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19995)
*Rui Xu,Tianyang Xue,Qiujie Dong,Le Wan,Zhe Zhu,Peng Li,Zhiyang Dou,Cheng Lin,Shiqing Xin,Yuan Liu,Wenping Wang,Taku Komura*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: MeshMosaic是一个新的框架，用于生成高三角形数量的艺术家设计的网格，解决了现有方法在处理长序列和有限量化分辨率方面的瓶颈，实现了比先前方法高得多的扩展性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的基于transformer的生成模型在扩展到高三角形数量的艺术家设计的网格时面临挑战，这是由于长序列瓶颈和有限的量化分辨率，导致无法精确再现精细的几何细节和结构化密度模式。

Method: MeshMosaic首先将形状分割成块，然后自回归地生成每个块，并利用共享的边界条件来促进相邻区域之间的连贯性、对称性和无缝连接。通过单独量化块，提高了向高分辨率网格扩展的能力，从而产生更对称和有组织的网格密度和结构。

Result: MeshMosaic在几何保真度和用户偏好方面显著优于最先进的方法，能够生成超过10万个三角形的网格，远超先前方法（约8千个面）。

Conclusion: MeshMosaic通过其局部到全局的方法，有效地解决了现有模型在处理高三角形数量的网格时的局限性，实现了卓越的细节表示和在实际应用中的网格生成能力。

Abstract: Scaling artist-designed meshes to high triangle numbers remains challenging
for autoregressive generative models. Existing transformer-based methods suffer
from long-sequence bottlenecks and limited quantization resolution, primarily
due to the large number of tokens required and constrained quantization
granularity. These issues prevent faithful reproduction of fine geometric
details and structured density patterns. We introduce MeshMosaic, a novel
local-to-global framework for artist mesh generation that scales to over 100K
triangles--substantially surpassing prior methods, which typically handle only
around 8K faces. MeshMosaic first segments shapes into patches, generating each
patch autoregressively and leveraging shared boundary conditions to promote
coherence, symmetry, and seamless connectivity between neighboring regions.
This strategy enhances scalability to high-resolution meshes by quantizing
patches individually, resulting in more symmetrical and organized mesh density
and structure. Extensive experiments across multiple public datasets
demonstrate that MeshMosaic significantly outperforms state-of-the-art methods
in both geometric fidelity and user preference, supporting superior detail
representation and practical mesh generation for real-world applications.

</details>


### [492] [KSDiff: Keyframe-Augmented Speech-Aware Dual-Path Diffusion for Facial Animation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20128)
*Tianle Lyu,Junchuan Zhao,Ye Wang*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: KSDiff是一个音频驱动的面部动画框架，通过解耦语音特征和识别关键帧来提高唇同步和头部姿势的准确性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有音频驱动面部动画方法未能有效捕捉语音特征的细微差别和动态关键帧，导致合成效果不佳。

Method: 提出KSDiff框架，使用双通路语音编码器（DPSE）解耦表情和头部姿势特征，并利用自动回归关键帧建立学习（KEL）模块预测运动关键帧，最后通过双通路运动生成器合成面部动画。

Result: KSDiff在HDTF和VoxCeleb数据集上实现了最先进的性能，提高了唇同步精度和头部姿势自然度。

Conclusion: 将语音解耦与关键帧感知扩散相结合是生成逼真Talking-head动画的有效方法。

Abstract: Audio-driven facial animation has made significant progress in multimedia
applications, with diffusion models showing strong potential for talking-face
synthesis. However, most existing works treat speech features as a monolithic
representation and fail to capture their fine-grained roles in driving
different facial motions, while also overlooking the importance of modeling
keyframes with intense dynamics. To address these limitations, we propose
KSDiff, a Keyframe-Augmented Speech-Aware Dual-Path Diffusion framework.
Specifically, the raw audio and transcript are processed by a Dual-Path Speech
Encoder (DPSE) to disentangle expression-related and head-pose-related
features, while an autoregressive Keyframe Establishment Learning (KEL) module
predicts the most salient motion frames. These components are integrated into a
Dual-path Motion generator to synthesize coherent and realistic facial motions.
Extensive experiments on HDTF and VoxCeleb demonstrate that KSDiff achieves
state-of-the-art performance, with improvements in both lip synchronization
accuracy and head-pose naturalness. Our results highlight the effectiveness of
combining speech disentanglement with keyframe-aware diffusion for talking-head
generation.

</details>


### [493] [LidarScout: Direct Out-of-Core Rendering of Massive Point Clouds](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.20198)
*Philipp Erler,Lukas Herzberger,Michael Wimmer,Markus Schütz*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 该方法能够即时可视化大规模点云数据，无需预处理，适用于地形测绘、林业、农业和基础设施规划等任务。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 大规模地形扫描产生的数据集过于庞大，导致即使是查看等基本任务也需要耗费大量时间进行预处理，以创建能够实时查看整个数据集的细节层次结构。

Method: 提出了一种能够即时可视化国家规模、包含数千亿个点的大规模点云数据的方法。该方法首先加载稀疏子采样点并初始化点云概览，然后进行表面重建以生成更高质量、无孔洞的高度图。当用户导航到感兴趣的区域时，会优先在该区域进行高度图构建。当用户缩放足够近时，会加载该区域的全分辨率点云数据并更新相应的高度图纹理。当用户导航到其他区域时，不再需要的全分辨率点数据会被卸载，但更新后 的高度图纹理会被保留作为一种中等细节层次。该方法构成了大规模点云数据的直接离核渲染形式，无需预处理和额外的磁盘空间。

Result: 该方法能够即时可视化国家规模、包含数千亿个点的大规模点云数据，无需预处理，并且不会占用额外的磁盘空间。

Conclusion: 该方法实现了一种直接的离核渲染技术，能够即时可视化大规模点云数据，无需预处理和额外的磁盘空间，解决了现有技术中存在的性能瓶颈。

Abstract: Large-scale terrain scans are the basis for many important tasks, such as
topographic mapping, forestry, agriculture, and infrastructure planning. The
resulting point cloud data sets are so massive in size that even basic tasks
like viewing take hours to days of pre-processing in order to create
level-of-detail structures that allow inspecting the data set in their entirety
in real time. In this paper, we propose a method that is capable of instantly
visualizing massive country-sized scans with hundreds of billions of points.
Upon opening the data set, we first load a sparse subsample of points and
initialize an overview of the entire point cloud, immediately followed by a
surface reconstruction process to generate higher-quality, hole-free
heightmaps. As users start navigating towards a region of interest, we continue
to prioritize the heightmap construction process to the user's viewpoint. Once
a user zooms in closely, we load the full-resolution point cloud data for that
region and update the corresponding height map textures with the
full-resolution data. As users navigate elsewhere, full-resolution point data
that is no longer needed is unloaded, but the updated heightmap textures are
retained as a form of medium level of detail. Overall, our method constitutes a
form of direct out-of-core rendering for massive point cloud data sets
(terabytes, compressed) that requires no preprocessing and no additional disk
space. Source code, executable, pre-trained model, and dataset are available
at: https://github.com/cg-tuwien/lidarscout

</details>


<div id='cs.ET'></div>

# cs.ET [[Back]](#toc)

### [494] [High Clockrate Free-space Optical In-Memory Computing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19642)
*Yuanhao Liang,James Wang,Kaiwen Xue,Xinyi Ren,Ran Yin,Shaoyuan Ou,Lian Zhou,Yuan Li,Tobias Heuser,Niels Heermeier,Ian Christen,James A. Lott,Stephan Reitzenstein,Mengjie Yu,Zaijun Chen*

Main category: cs.ET

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种名为 FAST-ONN 的光神经网络，能够以超低延迟和功耗实现高速、大规模的卷积计算，有望解决边缘设备部署深度神经网络的硬件瓶颈。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 目前在边缘设备上部署深度神经网络面临着计算硬件能效和可扩展性不足的挑战，尤其是在自动驾驶、三维环境感知和远程机器人等需要实时数据处理的应用中。

Method: 论文提出了一种结合了垂直腔面发射激光器（VCSELs）和空间光调制器（SLMs）的扇出空间飞行时间光学神经网络（FAST-ONN）。该系统利用高速 VCSELs 进行输入调制，利用高像素 SLMs 进行内存加权，并通过并行差分读出实现单次精确推理。

Result: FAST-ONN 在 YOLO 目标检测算法的特征提取中实现了每秒 1 亿帧（MFPS）的卷积速度，并展示了光子可重构能力，支持系统内的反向传播训练。VCSELs 的应用有望将时钟频率提升至 GHz 以上，为自由空间计算硬件的扩展提供了新的途径。

Conclusion: FAST-ONN 通过其高能效、低延迟和高可扩展性，为在边缘设备上实现大规模深度神经网络计算提供了创新的解决方案，推动了自由空间计算硬件的发展。

Abstract: The ability to process and act on data in real time is increasingly critical
for applications ranging from autonomous vehicles, three-dimensional
environmental sensing and remote robotics. However, the deployment of deep
neural networks (DNNs) in edge devices is hindered by the lack of
energy-efficient scalable computing hardware. Here, we introduce a fanout
spatial time-of-flight optical neural network (FAST-ONN) that calculates
billions of convolutions per second with ultralow latency and power
consumption. This is enabled by the combination of high-speed dense arrays of
vertical-cavity surface-emitting lasers (VCSELs) for input modulation with
spatial light modulators of high pixel counts for in-memory weighting. In a
three-dimensional optical system, parallel differential readout allows signed
weight values accurate inference in a single shot. The performance is
benchmarked with feature extraction in You-Only-Look-Once (YOLO) for
convolution at 100 million frames per second (MFPS), and in-system backward
propagation training with photonic reprogrammability. The VCSEL transmitters
are implementable in any free-space optical computing systems to improve the
clockrate to over gigahertz. The high scalability in device counts and channel
parallelism enables a new avenue to scale up free space computing hardware.

</details>


<div id='cs.MA'></div>

# cs.MA [[Back]](#toc)

### [495] [The Heterogeneous Multi-Agent Challenge](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19512)
*Charles Dansereau,Junior-Samuel Lopez-Yepez,Karthik Soma,Antoine Fagette*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: HeMARL领域缺乏标准化的基准测试环境，阻碍了该领域的研究进展。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: HeMARL（异构多智能体强化学习）领域虽然在现实世界中有广泛的应用前景，但由于大多数现有研究集中于同构智能体，且该领域缺乏标准化的测试环境，导致研究相对不足。

Method: 该论文提出需要为HeMARL建立标准化的测试环境，以促进该领域的研究和算法评估。

Result: 目前HeMARL领域的研究普遍使用过于简单的环境，导致算法性能评估失真，或者使用异构性较弱的环境，无法充分测试算法的性能。

Conclusion: 建立标准化的HeMARL测试环境至关重要，能够为该领域的研究提供可靠的基准，推动算法的有效发展和评估。

Abstract: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) is a growing research area which
gained significant traction in recent years, extending Deep RL applications to
a much wider range of problems. A particularly challenging class of problems in
this domain is Heterogeneous Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (HeMARL), where
agents with different sensors, resources, or capabilities must cooperate based
on local information. The large number of real-world situations involving
heterogeneous agents makes it an attractive research area, yet underexplored,
as most MARL research focuses on homogeneous agents (e.g., a swarm of identical
robots). In MARL and single-agent RL, standardized environments such as ALE and
SMAC have allowed to establish recognized benchmarks to measure progress.
However, there is a clear lack of such standardized testbed for cooperative
HeMARL. As a result, new research in this field often uses simple environments,
where most algorithms perform near optimally, or uses weakly heterogeneous MARL
environments.

</details>


### [496] [Knowledge Base-Aware Orchestration: A Dynamic, Privacy-Preserving Method for Multi-Agent Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19599)
*Danilo Trombino,Vincenzo Pecorella,Alessandro de Giulii,Davide Tresoldi*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: MAS使用知识库感知（KBA）编排，通过结合静态描述和动态相关性信号，实现更准确、自适应的任务路由，优于纯静态方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统MAS编排依赖过时的静态代理描述，导致在动态环境中任务路由效率低下。需要一种能适应代理能力动态变化的方法。

Method: 提出知识库感知（KBA）编排，通过代理的内部知识库（KB）生成隐私保护的相关性信号。当静态描述不足时，协调器并行提示子代理，子代理评估任务与私有KB的相关性，返回轻量级ACK信号（不暴露数据）。这些信号填充共享语义缓存，为未来查询提供动态代理适用性指标。

Result: KBA编排结合静态描述，实现了更准确、自适应的任务路由，同时保护代理自主性和数据机密性。

Conclusion: KBA编排在路由精度和系统效率上显著优于纯静态描述驱动的方法，适用于需要比标准描述驱动路由更高准确性的大规模系统。

Abstract: Multi-agent systems (MAS) are increasingly tasked with solving complex,
knowledge-intensive problems where effective agent orchestration is critical.
Conventional orchestration methods rely on static agent descriptions, which
often become outdated or incomplete. This limitation leads to inefficient task
routing, particularly in dynamic environments where agent capabilities
continuously evolve. We introduce Knowledge Base-Aware (KBA) Orchestration, a
novel approach that augments static descriptions with dynamic,
privacy-preserving relevance signals derived from each agent's internal
knowledge base (KB). In the proposed framework, when static descriptions are
insufficient for a clear routing decision, the orchestrator prompts the
subagents in parallel. Each agent then assesses the task's relevance against
its private KB, returning a lightweight ACK signal without exposing the
underlying data. These collected signals populate a shared semantic cache,
providing dynamic indicators of agent suitability for future queries. By
combining this novel mechanism with static descriptions, our method achieves
more accurate and adaptive task routing preserving agent autonomy and data
confidentiality. Benchmarks show that our KBA Orchestration significantly
outperforms static description-driven methods in routing precision and overall
system efficiency, making it suitable for large-scale systems that require
higher accuracy than standard description-driven routing.

</details>


<div id='cs.SI'></div>

# cs.SI [[Back]](#toc)

### [497] [Heaven & Hell: One-Step Hub Consensus](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19630)
*Nnamdi Daniel Aghanya*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: 在一个加权的`Glory`或`Gnash`状态的`hub`节点网络中，当`hub`节点到其他节点的连接权重足够大时，可以保证网络收敛到`Glory`状态。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 需要一种方法来确保中心化权威能够强制执行全局配置，以抵抗局部对等节点的影响。

Method: 研究了具有中心`hub`节点和二元顶点状态（'Glory'或'Gnash'）的有限加权有向图上的影响动力学。得出了一个局部且可高效检查的标准，该标准可确保从任何初始状态开始，在一次同步更新后即可全局收敛到`Glory`状态。非`hub`顶点的标准是：来自`hub`的传入权重必须至少等于来自所有其他节点的总传入权重。对于均匀`hub`广播，精确阈值等于所有顶点中非`hub`传入权重的最大值，并证明了该阈值是最优的。将结果扩展到`tau`-偏差更新规则和异步（Gauss-Seidel）调度，在相同的支配假设下，单次遍历仍然足够。

Result: 提出了一个局部条件，保证网络收敛到`Glory`状态。证明了该条件在同步和异步更新下都是最优的，并且在`tau`-偏差更新规则下也成立。

Conclusion: 证明了一个关键的支配假设对于保证网络中的全局收敛至关重要，并且该假设在多种更新规则下都适用。所有定理都有Coq形式化的机器检查证明。

Abstract: Many networked systems require a central authority to enforce a global
configuration against local peer influence. We study influence dynamics on
finite weighted directed graphs with a distinguished hub node and binary vertex
states ('Glory' or 'Gnash'). We give a sharp, local, and efficiently checkable
criterion that guarantees global convergence to Glory in a single synchronous
update from any initial state. At each non-hub vertex, the incoming weight from
the hub must at least match the total incoming weight from all other nodes.
Specialising in uniform hub broadcasts, the exact threshold equals the maximum
non-hub incoming weight over all vertices, and we prove this threshold is
tight. We extend the result to a tau-biased update rule and to asynchronous
(Gauss-Seidel) schedules, where a single pass still suffices under the same
domination hypothesis. Machine-checked proofs in Coq accompany all theorems.

</details>


### [498] [Deterministic Frequency--Domain Inference of Network Topology and Hidden Components via Structure--Behavior Scaling](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19857)
*Xiaoxiao Liang,Tianlong Fan,Linyuan Lü*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: 该研究揭示了复杂系统中行为信号与网络结构之间的普适性关联，并提出了一种基于频域分析的拓扑结构推理框架，可用于识别隐藏节点和边。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 从间接行为信号推断复杂系统（如恐怖分子网络、大脑或分子调控网络）中隐藏的交互和组件是一个基本挑战，尤其是在非线性动力学下。

Method: 利用演化博弈动力学下节点行为时间序列的频谱强度与其结构度之间存在的线性关系（S ∝ k），开发了一种基于离散傅里叶变换（DFT）的确定性、频域推理框架，通过选择性地扰动节点动力学来直接从支付序列中重建网络拓扑，无需先验知识。

Result: 该框架能够同时定位单个隐藏节点或识别连接到多个隐藏节点的全部边，并估计隐藏节点的数量。在合成和真实网络上的大量实验表明，该方法在拓扑重建和隐藏组件检测方面优于现有最先进的方法，并且能够高效地扩展到大型网络，对随机波动具有鲁棒性。

Conclusion: 该研究建立了局部动力学可观测值与全局结构推理之间的原则性联系，能够在具有隐藏元素的复杂系统中实现精确的拓扑恢复。

Abstract: Hidden interactions and components in complex systems-ranging from covert
actors in terrorist networks to unobserved brain regions and molecular
regulators-often manifest only through indirect behavioral signals. Inferring
the underlying network structure from such partial observations remains a
fundamental challenge, particularly under nonlinear dynamics. We uncover a
robust linear relationship between the spectral strength of a node's behavioral
time series under evolutionary game dynamics and its structural degree, $S
\propto k$, a structural-behavioral scaling that holds across network types and
scales, revealing a universal correspondence between local connectivity and
dynamic energy. Leveraging this insight, we develop a deterministic,
frequency-domain inference framework based on the discrete Fourier transform
(DFT) that reconstructs network topology directly from payoff sequences-without
prior knowledge of the network or internal node strategies-by selectively
perturbing node dynamics. The framework simultaneously localizes individual
hidden nodes or identifies all edges connected to multiple hidden nodes, and
estimates tight bounds on the number of hidden nodes. Extensive experiments on
synthetic and real-world networks demonstrate that our method consistently
outperforms state-of-the-art baselines in both topology reconstruction and
hidden component detection. Moreover, it scales efficiently to large networks,
offering robustness to stochastic fluctuations and overcoming the size
limitations of existing techniques. Our work establishes a principled
connection between local dynamic observables and global structural inference,
enabling accurate topology recovery in complex systems with hidden elements.

</details>


<div id='cond-mat.mes-hall'></div>

# cond-mat.mes-hall [[Back]](#toc)

### [499] [Unifying framework for non-Hermitian and Hermitian topology in driven-dissipative systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19433)
*Clara C. Wanjura,Andreas Nunnenkamp*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: We generalize the connection between non-Hermitian topology and directional amplification to multiple bands and higher dimensions using a new concept called generalised singular spectrum (GSS). This allows us to define new topological invariants and edge modes, demonstrated in 1D and 2D models, with potential applications in amplifiers and sensors.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to extend the existing framework connecting non-trivial non-Hermitian topology with directional amplification from one complex band to multiple bands and higher spatial dimensions.

Method: The authors introduce a new quantity called generalised singular spectrum (GSS), derived from singular value decomposition, to define physically meaningful bands, invariants for point gaps (non-Hermitian topology) and line gaps (Hermitian-like topology), and prove bulk-boundary correspondence. They illustrate these concepts using a 1D non-Hermitian Su-Schrieffer-Heeger (SSH) model and a 2D non-Hermitian model.

Result: The study defines new topological invariants and demonstrates two different kinds of topological edge modes, showing a bulk-boundary correspondence for both. The results are illustrated with specific 1D and 2D models, including one exhibiting corner-to-corner amplification.

Conclusion: The work successfully extends the understanding of non-Hermitian topology and directional amplification to more complex systems (multiple bands, higher dimensions), introducing the GSS as a key tool. This provides a foundation for developing novel directional amplifiers and non-reciprocal sensors relevant to various experimental platforms.

Abstract: Recently, a one-to-one correspondence between non-trivial non-Hermitian
topology and directional amplification has been demonstrated, theoretically and
experimentally, for the case of one complex band. Here, we extend our framework
to multiple bands and higher spatial dimension. This proves to be far from
trivial. Building on the singular value decomposition, we introduce a new
quantity that we dub generalised singular spectrum (GSS). The GSS allows us to
define physically meaningful bands related to the system's scattering behaviour
and to define invariants for novel notions of point gaps (non-Hermitian
topology) and line gaps (Hermitian-like topology), respectively. For both
invariants, we prove a bulk-boundary correspondence and show that they give
rise to two different kinds of topological edge modes. We illustrate our
results with a 1D non-Hermitian Su-Schrieffer-Heeger (SSH) model and a 2D
non-Hermitian model that features corner-to-corner amplification. Our work is
relevant for many state-of-the-art experimental platforms and it sets the stage
for applications such as novel directional amplifiers and non-reciprocal
sensors.

</details>


### [500] [Quantum Dynamics of Electron Scattering from Skyrmions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19437)
*Hareram Swain,Arijit Mandal,S. Satpathy,B. R. K. Nanda*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: Error


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Error

Method: Error

Result: Error

Conclusion: Error

Abstract: Scattering of electrons from chiral spin textures such as the skyrmions is an
emerging research area due to its richness in topological quantum transport,
which is significant for spintronic devices. We study the dynamical process of
scattering of the spin-$\frac{1}{2}$ particles in the form of Gaussian
wavepackets from skyrmions with the aid of the non-relativistic time-dependent
Schr\"odinger equation. The scattering cross section shows a rich angular
dependence and is deterministically influenced by the iterative flipping of the
spin state inside the skyrmion. The latter leads to a set of non-trivial
outcomes which include finite transmission and reflection probabilities
irrespective of interaction strength, formation of secondary wavefronts
associated with back-converted spin components, and a long-lived quasi-bound
state at the scattering center. In addition to the rich and intriguing physics,
the numerical recipe developed here can be easily adopted for any arbitrary
spin texture, which will prepare a playground to explore tunable spin
transport.

</details>


### [501] [Electrical detection of magnons with nanoscale magnetic tunnel junctions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19483)
*Christopher Heins,Zeling Xiong,Attila Kákay,Joo-Von Kim,Thibaut Devolder,Aleksandra Titova,Johannes Müller,René Hübner,Andreas Worbs,Ryszard Narkowicz,Jürgen Fassbender,Katrin Schultheiss,Helmut Schultheiss*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本研究利用纳米磁性隧道结（MTJ）实现了对自旋波的电学探测，克服了传统电子器件的能耗和发热问题，并为自旋波在量子信息处理中的应用开辟了新途径。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的基于电荷的电子器件存在发热和功耗问题。自旋电子学和宏观自旋波学利用自旋自由度提供了潜在的解决方案。宏观自旋波学利用磁性材料中的集体激发——自旋波——来处理和传输信息，但缺乏高效的全电学、高分辨率、兼容半导体工艺的读出方法。

Method: 通过在先进的互补金属氧化物半导体（CMOS）生产线上制造的纳米磁性隧道结（MTJ）单元，实现了对自旋波的电学探测。通过工程化设计自旋波与MTJ磁化状态的动态耦合，实现了将自旋波激发转化为可测量的电信号，且保真度高。

Result: 成功实现了利用纳米磁性隧道结（MTJ）进行自旋波的电学探测。发现与非线性过程相关的光谱线宽可达几百kHz，为自旋波作为量子换能器提供了新的视角。

Conclusion: 本研究成功演示了利用纳米磁性隧道结（MTJ）进行自旋波的电学探测，克服了传统电子器件的限制，并为自旋波在量子信息处理中的应用提供了新的可能性。

Abstract: Present information and communication technologies are largely based on
electronic devices, which suffer from heat generation and high power
consumption. Alternatives like spintronics and magnonics, which harness the
spin degree of freedom, offer compelling pathways to overcome these fundamental
limitations of charge-based electronics. Magnonics relies on spin waves, the
collective excitations of magnetic moments in magnetically ordered materials,
to achieve processing and transport of information at microwave frequencies
without relying on charge currents. However, efficient means for
all-electrical, high-resolution, semiconductor-compatible readout of
information encoded in spin waves are still missing. Here, we demonstrate the
electrical detection of spin waves using a nanoscale magnetic tunnel junction
(MTJ) cell fabricated in a state-of-the-art complementary
metal-oxide-semiconductor (CMOS) production line. By engineering the dynamic
coupling between spin waves and the magnetization state of the MTJ, we
demonstrate transduction of spin-wave excitations into measurable electrical
signals with high fidelity. Moreover, through these measurements, we find
spectral line widths, associated with nonlinear processes, down to a few
hundreds of kHz, which opens up new perspectives for spin waves as quantum
transducers.

</details>


### [502] [Rapid Autotuning of a SiGe Quantum Dot into the Single-Electron Regime with Machine Learning and RF-Reflectometry FPGA-Based Measurements](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19537)
*Marc-Antoine Roux,Joffrey Rivard,Victor Yon,Alexis Morel,Dominic Leclerc,Claude Rohrbacher,El Bachir Ndiaye,Felice Francesco Tafuri,Brendan Bono,Stefan Kubicek,Roger Loo,Yosuke Shimura,Julien Jussot,Clément Godfrin,Danny Wan,Kristiaan De Greve,Marc-André Tétrault,Dominique Drouin,Christian Lupien,Michel Pioro-Ladrière,Eva Dupont-Ferrier*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过结合测量速度提升和减少测量次数，可以显著加速量子点设备的调谐过程，将稳定性图谱的测量时间缩短了9.8倍，总初始化时间缩短了2.2倍。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了实现高保真度的量子门操作，自旋量子比特需要在精确的电压空间内运行，而获取和搜索这些精确的电荷状态所需的稳定性图谱耗时且随着量子比特数量的增加而变得更加复杂。因此，需要更快的稳定性图谱获取方法来扩展自旋量子比特量子处理器。

Method: 本研究结合了测量速度提升（利用FPGA加速）和测量次数减少（通过基于神经网络的自动调谐算法），以加速量子点设备的调谐过程。

Result: 稳定性图谱的测量时间缩短了9.8倍，SiGe量子点进入单电子状态的总初始化时间（受Python代码执行限制）加速了2.2倍。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的方法显著加速了量子点设备的调谐过程，为扩展自旋量子比特量子处理器提供了有效的解决方案。

Abstract: Spin qubits need to operate within a very precise voltage space around charge
state transitions to achieve high-fidelity gates. However, the stability
diagrams that allow the identification of the desired charge states are long to
acquire. Moreover, the voltage space to search for the desired charge state
increases quickly with the number of qubits. Therefore, faster stability
diagram acquisitions are needed to scale up a spin qubit quantum processor.
Currently, most methods focus on more efficient data sampling. Our approach
shows a significant speedup by combining measurement speedup and a reduction in
the number of measurements needed to tune a quantum dot device. Using an
autotuning algorithm based on a neural network and faster measurements by
harnessing the FPGA embedded in Keysight's Quantum Engineering Toolkit (QET),
the measurement time of stability diagrams has been reduced by a factor of 9.8.
This led to an acceleration factor of 2.2 for the total initialization time of
a SiGe quantum dot into the single-electron regime, which is limited by the
Python code execution.

</details>


### [503] [Harmonic and Subharmonic Magnon Generation in a Surface Acoustic Wave Resonator](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19706)
*Yunyoung Hwang,Liyang Liao,Jorge Puebla,Marco Brühlmann,Carlos Gonzalez-Ballestero,Kouta Kondou,Naoki Ogawa,Sadamichi Maekawa,Yoshichika Otani*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过微聚焦布里渊光散射实验观察到在包含Co$_{20}$Fe$_{60}$B$_{20}$薄膜的片上表面声波谐振器中产生宏观谐波和亚谐波。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探索在宏观-声子耦合系统中产生和控制非线性宏观波的新方法，为宏观信号处理提供新途径。

Method: 使用微聚焦布里渊光散射技术，并旋转平面内磁场来调节宏观-声子耦合强度（从弱到强），在同一谐振器中进行实验。

Result: 在弱耦合下，观察到单一的宏观弹性波信号（f1）。在强耦合下，除了宏观弹性波信号外，还观察到了3/2f1、2f1和3f1的亚谐波和谐波信号，且结果与分析模型吻合良好。

Conclusion: 实验结果表明，在强耦合状态下，声子可以作为产生和控制非线性宏观波的手段，为宏观信号处理开辟了新路径。

Abstract: We experimentally observe the generation of magnon harmonics and subharmonics
in an on-chip surface acoustic wave resonator incorporating a thin
Co$_{20}$Fe$_{60}$B$_{20}$ film, using micro-focused Brillouin light
scattering. In our devices, rotating the in-plane magnetic field allows
continuous tuning of the magnon-phonon coupling from weak to strong within the
same resonator. In the weak coupling regime, we only observe fundamental
magnetoelastic wave signal at $f_{1}$. Conversely, in the strong coupling
regime, in addition to the fundamental magnetoelastic wave, we observe
subharmonic and harmonic signals at $3/2f_{1}$, $2f_{1}$, and $3f_{1}$, which
are well reproduced by our analytical model. Our results establish phonons as a
means to generate and control nonlinear magnons in the strong coupling regime,
providing a new route for magnonic signal processing.

</details>


### [504] [Projective crystal symmetry and topological phases](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19735)
*Chen Zhang,Shengyuan A. Yang,Y. X. Zhao*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本文概述了晶体对称性的投影表示及其在凝聚态物理和拓扑现象中的新兴研究领域。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文旨在探讨晶体对称性的投影表示，并阐述其在凝聚态物理和拓扑现象中的重要性，特别是其近年来在理论和实验研究中引起的新兴关注。

Method: 本文解释了晶体对称性投影表示的基本概念和思想，并强调了动量空间非同构对称性的出现是其独特特征，这导致了动量空间基本域的简化，包括二维的环面和克莱因瓶，以及三维的十种platycosms。

Result: 晶体对称性的投影表示导致了动量空间基本域的显著简化，包括各种紧凑流形，如二维的环面和克莱因瓶，以及三维的十种platycosms，为拓扑结构提供了比传统设置更丰富的可能性。

Conclusion: 本文总结了该领域的研究现状，并指出了未来的研究方向和潜在机遇，强调了晶体对称性投影表示在拓扑现象研究中的新兴作用。

Abstract: Quantum states naturally represent symmetry groups, though often in a
projective sense. Intriguingly, the projective nature of crystalline symmetries
has remained underexplored until very recently. A series of groundbreaking
theoretical and experimental studies have now brought this to light,
demonstrating that projective representations of crystal symmetries lead to
remarkable consequences in condensed matter physics and various artificial
crystals, particularly in their connection to topological phenomena. In this
article, we explain the basic ideas and notions underpinning these recent
developments and share our perspective on this emerging research area. We
specifically highlight that the appearance of momentum-space nonsymmorphic
symmetry is a unique feature of projective crystal symmetry representations.
This, in turn, has the profound consequence of reducing the fundamental domain
of momentum space to all possible flat compact manifolds, which include torus
and Klein bottle in 2D and the ten platycosms in 3D, presenting a significantly
richer landscape for topological structures than conventional settings.
Finally, the ongoing efforts and promising future research directions are
discussed.

</details>


### [505] [Domain wall skyrmion-based magnonic crystal](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19741)
*Zhenyu Wang,Xingen Zheng,Zhixiong Li,Zhizhi Zhang,Xiansi Wang*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 基于畴壁（DW）的磁子波导是实现磁子纳米电路的关键突破，但其对行波的有效控制仍有待探索。本文利用畴壁斯格明子（DWSK）链构建磁子晶体（MC），实现了对DW中自旋波传播的调控。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 实现对畴壁（DW）中行波的有效控制。

Method: 利用电压控制的Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用创建DWSK链，构建MC，并利用磁场调控DWSK尺寸来动态调整磁子带隙，进而调控自旋波传播。

Result: DWSK链可以被创建，DWSK基MC打开了磁子带隙，并且可以通过磁场调控DWSK尺寸来动态调整。在弯曲的DW中，DWSK基MC对自旋波的操纵保持鲁棒性。

Conclusion: 提供了一种控制DW中自旋波传播的有效方法，为设计节能磁子纳米电路铺平了道路。

Abstract: Magnonic waveguide based on domain wall (DW) is considered as a crucial
breakthrough toward the realization of magnonic nanocircuits. However, the
effective control of spin waves propagating in DWs remains to be explored.
Here, we construct a magnonic crystal (MC) by using a chain of the domain wall
skyrmions (DWSKs) to manipulate the spin-wave propagation in DWs. We show that
the DWSK chain can be created by leveraging voltage-controlled
Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction. The DWSK-based MC opens magnonic bandgaps,
which can be dynamically adjusted through magnetic fields modulating the DWSK
size. Furthermore, the manipulation of spin waves by the DWSK-based MC
maintains robust in curved DW, demonstrating its adaptability to complex device
architectures. Our work provides an effective method to control the spin-wave
propagation in DWs and paves the way for designing energy-efficient magnonic
nanocircuits.

</details>


### [506] [$\mathbb{Z}_2$ topological invariant in three-dimensional PT- and PC-symmetric class CI band structures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19825)
*Ken Shiozaki*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 文章提出了一个适用于PT和PC对称性的三维材料的Z2拓扑不变量，并构建了相应的格点模型来验证其有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在对称性类别CI（由PT和PC对称性定义）的三维材料中，缺少一个Z2拓扑不变量，而PT对称性允许定义实贝里连接和eta不变量，并在此基础上定义了自旋-Chern-Simons（spin-CS）作用量。

Method: 利用PC对称性将自旋-Chern-Simons（spin-CS）作用量量化为{0, 2π}，并具有4π周期性，从而得到一个明确定义的Z2不变量。该不变量具有可加性，在全局Takagi分解存在时可简化为已知的Z2指数，并且依赖于自旋结构的选择。

Result: 文章提出了一种新的Z2拓扑不变量，并构建了相应的格点模型。通过这些模型，可以区分出先前已知的拓扑指数无法探测到的拓扑相。

Conclusion: 文章成功构建了一个新的Z2拓扑不变量，填补了对称性类别CI的三维材料在拓扑不变量方面的空白。该不变量具有加性，在特定条件下可简化，并对自旋结构敏感。通过格点模型验证了该不变量的有效性，能够识别出更广泛的拓扑相。

Abstract: We construct a previously missing $\mathbb{Z}_2$ topological invariant for
three-dimensional band structures in symmetry class CI defined by parity-time
(PT) and parity-particle-hole (PC) symmetries. PT symmetry allows one to define
a real Berry connection and, based on the $\eta$-invariant, a
spin-Chern--Simons (spin-CS) action. We show that PC symmetry quantizes the
spin-CS action to $\{0,2\pi\}$ with $4\pi$ periodicity, thereby yielding a
well-defined $\mathbb{Z}_2$ invariant. This invariant is additive under direct
sums of isolated band structures, reduces to a known $\mathbb{Z}_2$ index when
a global Takagi factorization exists, and in general depends on the choice of
spin structure. Finally, we demonstrate lattice models in which this newly
introduced $\mathbb{Z}_2$ invariant distinguishes topological phases that
cannot be detected by the previously known topological indices.

</details>


### [507] [Exploration of Altermagnetism in $\mathrm{RuO_{2}}$](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19932)
*Yu-Xin Li,Yiyuan Chen,Liqing Pan,Shuai Li,Song-Bo Zhang,Hai-Zhou Lu*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: $	ext{RuO}_2$ 是一种反马氏体材料，具有零净磁化和动量空间各向异性自旋分裂的特性，在物理学和技术领域引起了广泛关注。该综述通过 $	ext{RuO}_2$ 的案例，系统地探讨了晶体结构、磁结构、电子能带特性和输运现象，并批判性地评估了围绕 $	ext{RuO}_2$ 本征磁性的争议，最后讨论了该领域的未来研究方向。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 鉴于磁性材料在现代科技中的重要性，以及反马氏体材料（同时具有零净磁化和动量空间各向异性自旋分裂特性）日益增长的研究兴趣，本综述旨在系统性地梳理和探讨作为领先反马氏体材料的 $	ext{RuO}_2$。

Method: 通过对 $	ext{RuO}_2$ 的特定案例进行研究，系统性地 survey 了其晶体和磁结构、电子能带性质以及输运现象，并结合反马氏体在输运中的信号以及磁性和光谱测量结果的对比，批判性地评估了关于 $	ext{RuO}_2$ 本征磁性的争论。

Result: $	ext{RuO}_2$ 样品中已观察到多种新奇的反马氏体现象，但其本征磁性仍是争论焦点。输运测量结果支持反马氏体特性，但与磁性和光谱测量结果存在差异。

Conclusion: $	ext{RuO}_2$ 是研究反马氏体现象的重要模型材料，尽管其本征磁性尚存争议，但已展现出多种反马氏体独有的现象。未来的研究应着重于解决其本征磁性的争议，并进一步探索其在物理学和技术领域的应用潜力。

Abstract: The fundamental role of magnetic materials in modern science and technology
has driven a rapid surge in research on unconventional magnetism in recent
years. In particular, altermagnets, which simultaneously exhibit zero net
magnetization in real space and anisotropic spin splitting in momentum space,
have garnered significant interest for both fundamental physics and
technological applications. Among these, $\mathrm{RuO_{2}}$ stands as the
pioneering and most extensively studied altermagnet. While the intrinsic
magnetic order of $\mathrm{RuO_{2}}$ is still a subject of active debate,
numerous exotic phenomena characteristic of altermagnetism have been observed
in $\mathrm{RuO_{2}}$ samples. In this review, we explore each facet of the
altermagnetism through specific case studies in $\mathrm{RuO_{2}}$,
systematically surveying its crystal and magnetic structures, electronic band
properties, and transport phenomena. We critically assess the debate
surrounding the intrinsic magnetism in $\mathrm{RuO_{2}}$, incorporating
evidence from altermagnetic signatures in transport, as well as contrasting
results from magnetic and spectroscopic measurements. Finally, possible future
research directions in this field are discussed.

</details>


### [508] [Non-ohmic to ohmic crossover in the breakdown of the quantum Hall states in graphene under broadband excitations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19978)
*Torsten Röper,Aifei Zhang,Kenji Watanabe,Takashi Taniguchi,Olivier Maillet,François D. Parmentier,Erwann Bocquillon*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 石墨烯的量子霍尔效应在宽能量范围内存在击穿的可能性。本研究使用高迁移率石墨烯 Corbino 器件，在 DC 到 10 GHz 的宽带激励下研究了量子霍尔效应的击穿。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究石墨烯中量子霍尔效应在宽能量范围内的击穿现象。

Method: 通过在 DC 到 10 GHz 的宽带激励下，在石墨烯 Corbino 器件中研究量子霍尔效应的击穿。使用变量跳跃（VRH）模型来描述电导率，并从温度和场驱动的测量中提取跳跃能量。利用 VRH 测温法区分冷电子和热电子状态。

Result: 发现电导率可以用 VRH 描述，并区分了非欧姆 VRH 和焦耳加热两种状态。证明了量子霍尔效应在石墨烯中的击穿是从非欧姆、场驱动的 VRH 过渡到欧姆、焦耳加热主导的传输。

Conclusion: 石墨烯中的量子霍尔效应击穿是从非欧姆、场驱动的 VRH 过渡到欧姆、焦耳加热主导的传输。

Abstract: Graphene, through the coexistence of large cyclotron gaps and small spin and
valley gaps, offers the possibility to study the breakdown of the quantum Hall
effect across a wide range of energy scales. In this work, we investigate the
breakdown of the QHE in high-mobility graphene Corbino devices under broadband
excitation ranging from DC up to 10 GHz. We find that the conductance is
consistently described by variable range hopping (VRH) and extract the hopping
energies from both temperature and field-driven measurements. Using VRH
thermometry, we are able to distinguish between a cold and hot electron regime,
which are dominated by non-ohmic VRH and Joule heating, respectively. Our
results demonstrate that breakdown in the quantum Hall regime of graphene is
governed by a crossover from non-ohmic, field-driven VRH to ohmic,
Joule-heating-dominated transport.

</details>


### [509] [Breakdown of symmetry constraint in Floquet topological superconductor](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.19992)
*Ming-Jian Gao,Jun-Hong An*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过周期性驱动打破对称性对拓扑相的限制，创造出丰富的第一类和混合序拓扑超导体及马约拉纳模式。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 对称性对拓扑超导体中马约拉纳模式的存在、类别和阶数施加了严格限制，阻碍了其可控性和应用。本研究旨在打破这种限制。

Method: 提出一种Floquet工程方法，通过对禁止存在第一类拓扑相的对称类别系统施加周期性驱动。

Result: 生成了丰富的第一类马约拉纳模式。同时，在准能量隙中或单个准能量隙中，轻易生成了具有第一类马约拉纳边界模式和第二类马约拉纳角模式共存的外来混合序拓扑超导体。

Conclusion: 该研究结果刷新了关于对称性对拓扑相限制的普遍认识，为在不改变对称性的情况下创造外来拓扑超导体开辟了道路，并极大地拓宽了承载拓扑超导体材料的范围。

Abstract: Topological superconductor is regarded as an ideal candidate for topological
quantum computing due to its ability to simulate the enigmatic Majorana
fermions that satisfy non-Abelian statistics. Previous studies revealed that
symmetry exerts an unbreakable constraint on the existence, classes, and orders
of Majorana modes. It severely limits the controllability and application of
Majorana modes. Here, we propose a Floquet-engineering method to break this
symmetry-imposed constraint on topological phases. By applying periodic driving
on a system belonging to a symmetry class that prohibits the existence of
first-order topological phases, we find that rich first-order Majorana modes
